subtitles:
260693 263526 You are confused, aren't you?
Frightened.
263563 265258 That's all right. I can help you.
265298 266287 Who is this?

266332 268357 I am a doctor.
Now, you must listen to me.

268407 271063 You have lost your memory.
There was an experiment.

271104 273004 Something went wrong.
Your memory was erased.
273039 274028 Do you understand me?

274073 276166 No, I don't understand.
What the hell is going on here?

276209 278734 Just listen. There are people
coming for you even as we speak.

278778 281713 You must not let them find you.
You must leave now.
282482 285246 Hello? Are you there?

344344 346812 Hey, Mr. Murdoch.
The Automat called.
346846 348780 Said you left your wallet there.

349749 353014 I suggest you retrieve it since
you only paid for 3 weeks...
353052 354917 and they was up 10 minutes ago.
357023 358615 I've been here 3 weeks?

358658 360990 It's right there in
black and white, Mr. Murdoch.
361694 363423 Day and date.

364130 367588 We make our books like we make
our beds, all neat and tidy.
367633 369464 I'll take care of it when I get back.

369502 371663 See that you do.
Only thing makes you a guest...

371704 374036 in this joint, pal,
is cash on the barrelhead.

398030 400555 House rules.
3 weeks is 3 weeks.
400600 403364 No days off for good behavior.
425358 428987 Mr. Murdoch, yes, where is he?
429028 432725 He just left not 5 minutes ago.

440039 444237 # When marimba rhythms
start to play #
444277 446336 # Dance with me #
446379 449371 # Make me sway #

449415 453545 # Like a lazy ocean
hugs the shore #
453586 455781 # Hold me close #
455822 458586 # Sway me more #

458624 462890 # Like a flower
bending in the breeze #
462929 465329 # Bend with me #
465364 468265 # Sway with ease #

468301 472465 # When we dance
you have a way with me #
472505 474700 # Stay with me #
474740 477174 # Sway with me #
478077 479066 Hey, sweetie!

480046 482139 He said he was your
husband's doctor.
482181 483648 He wanted to speak with you.

508107 511133 Schreber. Please,
won't you come in?
511177 513270 You must be Emma Murdoch.

514180 517308 Thank you for coming to see me
on such short notice.
519118 520847 What is this?

521787 525814 A rather crude experiment...
designed to further my studies.
525858 527018 I don't understand.

527059 532156 You say you're my husband's doctor,
but he never mentioned you to me.
532198 533529 The truth is, Mrs. Murdoch...

533566 536034 John has been coming to
see me for quite some time.

536068 539799 He had been grappling
with feelings of betrayal...

539839 542967 stemming from your
marital difficulties.

543009 545170 - John told you what happened?
- Yes.

546245 548543 When was the last time
that you saw him?

550082 553848 He packed a suitcase.
He was very angry at me.

553886 556878 I understand how difficult
this must be for you.

556923 558550 But for John's sake,
I would like you...

558591 561219 to think of me
as your friend, Emma.

561260 565026 It appears that John has suffered
a psychotic break.
565064 566292 Complete memory loss.
567934 569959 He may be delusional.
570002 571902 Even violent.

574674 577837 if he were to contact you,
and I suspect he will...

577877 580744 you must call me immediately.
Do you understand?

580780 585149 It is imperative that I be
the first one to reach him.

585184 588517 Wherever your husband is,
he is searching...
602535 604400 Good evening, Mr. Murdoch.
604437 607201 It is Mr. Murdoch, isn't it?

607239 611107 Mr... was it
"J"...something... Murdoch?
615281 618773 What's your name? Justin? Jerry?

622488 624581 My name's Jason Murdoch.
John Murdoch.
624624 626057 Jake Murdoch. How's it going?
626092 627252 Hi. Jack Murdoch.

674507 677670 I told the guy,
"Cash on the barrelhead."
677710 681168 I said, "Listen, 3 weeks is 3 weeks."
681213 682441 Where's our lucky winner?
682481 685314 Upstairs, sir, room 614.
685351 688115 Another call girl.
691857 693586 Evening, Husselbeck.
693626 694957 Inspector Bumstead.
694994 696928 Your lace is untied.
710142 711632 Am I glad you're here, sir.

711677 714305 They say Detective Walenski's
got the heebie-jeebies.

714346 716610 Just take what they give me,
Husselbeck.

723889 727791 Wow. Looks like somebody
woke up on the wrong side of the bed.

770870 773395 - Hello.
- Oh, it's you.
773439 774838 You left your wallet here, buddy.
774874 776171 When did I do that?
776208 777334 When you was last here.

777376 780504 - When was that?
- When you left your wallet.
780546 782309 You expect me to remember?
785117 788348 Hello. Excuse me.
789288 791256 No, no, seriously.

809742 811869 - Where you headed, chief?
- Home.
811911 812935 And where's home?

812978 815742 Haven't you mugs got
anything better to do?

815781 818045 Well, I'm just trying
to do my job, May.

818083 820142 There's a killer out there
in case you hadn't noticed.

820186 822882 Maybe you should be out looking for him
instead of cooling your heels, huh?
826258 827885 Go on, get out of here.
838437 840667 Round and round she goes.
843108 847204 Where she stops? Nobody knows.

850382 853510 What's that make so far, Husselbeck?
6 hookers in all?
853552 855019 I believe so, sir.
855054 857579 Give the man an "A" for effort.

857623 859853 You'd think these stiffs
would have the good grace...
859892 862019 to expire at a good time of night.
863028 864996 Hey, too bad about Walenski, huh?
868667 870191 I guess he'd seen enough.
877309 878298 So, Husselbeck...

879745 886116 what kind of killer do you think
stops to save a dying fish?
886151 887140 You've got me, sir.
887186 889313 Bumstead, what took you?

889355 892620 This killer's been running circles
around us thanks to Walenski.

892658 894421 With all due respect,
Chief Inspector...

894460 897452 I've known Eddie a long time.
He's a good cop.

897496 901694 Whatever kind of cop Walenski once was,
he let drift a long time ago.
901734 903565 Let me talk to Bumstead!
903602 904967 Come on, let's go.
906405 908703 Frank, Frank!
910175 911301 Get his arm!
911343 912332 They're watching us!
912378 913402 On your feet.
913445 914878 There's no way out!
914914 916245 Don't make us hurt you.
916282 918011 God, can't you see?!
921387 922718 Let me go, let me go!
922755 924222 I'm not gonna hurt you. I'm not...

925291 927521 - What was that?
- Walenski.
935901 939064 I'm being punished for my sins, right?
939104 941470 What did I ever do to inherit this?
941507 942599 Where do you begin?

942641 947635 Well, everything Detective Walenski
committed to paper should be here, so...

947680 951172 The only thing that should
be committed is Walenski.
952785 955117 Nothing like a little healthy paranoia.

958657 961785 Sir, we just got
the fingerprint results in.
965164 966927 What is this, some kind of joke?
971170 972535 Don't throw anything away.
978677 979769 Inspector Bumstead.

982047 984777 I came here to file
a missing persons report for my husband.
985551 987451 Take it to the front desk.
987486 989317 They told me to come see you.
991090 993285 His name's John Murdoch.

994326 997352 Mrs. Murdoch,
why didn't you report this before?

997396 1002595 I mean, if your husband has been missing
as long as you say...

1002634 1005330 I thought he'd simply
walked out on me.

1006505 1010464 Then a... doctor contacted me
this evening.
1010509 1012136 How long have you been married?
1012177 1013474 Nearly four years.
1014580 1016445 Why do you ask?

1016482 1019576 Because you seem uncomfortable
with your ring.

1019618 1023281 As if you were...
unaccustomed to wearing it.
1023322 1024755 No, I never take it off.

1031330 1035357 Do these names
mean anything to you?
1040706 1042606 No. Who are these women?

1043509 1045204 Why are you looking
for my husband?

1045911 1047776 Are you going to accuse him
of something?
1047813 1050111 Maybe. Maybe murder.
1050149 1051173 Whose murder?

1052584 1056281 - Which one?
- All of them.

1057256 1059451 Mrs. Murdoch,
I am sorry, I'm sorry.
1059491 1060549 I didn't mean to alarm you.

1060592 1063152 I'm so sorry that I came.
Just both made a mistake.
1063195 1064662 Mrs. Murdoch, if you please.

1064696 1067130 If you'll just give me
half a second to explain...
1070469 1071458 I'll be right out.
1095627 1097925 Have we met before?

1097963 1101592 If we did...
I hope you're still breathing.
1101633 1103260 What's your name, honey?
1107039 1108802 Well, that's an appropriate name.
1116849 1118043 I was just thinking.
1125057 1128356 seems kind of dangerous...

1130429 1132158 I mean, how do you know
I'm not the killer?

1132197 1135394 You don't seem like
the killer type. Why?

1136602 1139127 You feeling any urges
I should know about?

1220919 1224650 So it seems you've discovered
your unpleasant nature.

1228894 1232557 We might ask
the same question, yes?

1315981 1319280 What is to be done?
This man is dangerous.
1319318 1321252 It is said he is able to tune.
1321286 1322651 Impossible.

1322688 1325486 We have seen it
with our own eyes.

1325524 1327958 On occasion the imprinting
does not take.

1327993 1330962 They behave erratically
when they awaken.

1330996 1334625 We find them wandering
like lost children.
1334666 1336827 But this one was different, yes?

1336868 1338563 What has the doctor
to say about this?
1338603 1340594 He has failed to report in.

1340639 1343767 - And Mr. Quick?
- No more Mr. Quick.
1343809 1346801 Mr. Quick, dead, yes.
1349848 1352442 Poor, poor Mr. Quick.
1352484 1355351 Mr. Book, does he know?
1356688 1358519 Should we not know, Mr. Hand?

1359491 1362358 We had hoped to learn more
before sharing with you.

1362394 1365329 We can know nothing
until we possess him.
1366398 1368958 Mr. Night, you will take the East.
1369000 1371798 Mr. Face, you the West.
1371837 1373930 Mr. Glove, the South.
1373972 1376202 Mr. Shade, the North.
1377743 1380712 We must have this man.

1394359 1399353 Do you really think my husband could be
capable of committing those murders?

1403034 1406492 Let's hope, for both our sakes,
that I'm wrong.
1450215 1452342 I've been so worried about you.
1455754 1457847 Are you punishing me?

1457889 1460483 You know, if disappearing
is your way of punishing me...
1460525 1461617 I don't appreciate it.

1461660 1463719 I don't know what
you're talking about.
1466565 1469056 I found these keys in my pocket...
1469100 1471796 so I assume I live here.
1471837 1473600 You supposed to be my wife?
1473638 1475663 Supposed to be?
1480045 1483276 don't know who I am, do you?
1483315 1484509 Your doctor called me.

1484549 1486039 He was worried
that this might happen.
1490188 1492213 he gave me his card.
1492257 1494782 He's desperate to find you.

1501666 1503759 I feel like I'm living out
someone else's nightmare.

1503802 1506566 What happened to me?
Why was I seeing a doctor?
1507305 1509432 I had an affair.
1510509 1512943 You were angry at me.
1515380 1517245 The police are looking for you.
1517282 1519580 I know. I saw the papers.
1519618 1522178 "Killer stalks city streetwalkers."
1525690 1529285 I was with one of those women...
1529327 1531124 before I came here tonight.
1531796 1533457 I don't understand.
1533498 1534965 I met her outside an Automat.
1536468 1539028 I guess I wanted to test myself.

1539070 1543006 I wanted to know if I had it in me
to do those things.

1543041 1547637 Maybe I have lost my mind, but whoever
I am, I'm still me and I'm not a killer.
1553985 1555953 I believe you.

1563261 1566059 The car outside,
the one you arrived in.

1566097 1568429 It's a cop.
He dropped me off here.
1570569 1573197 I didn't know he was still here.
1575574 1578304 Hold it right there, mister!
1579711 1581679 Wait. You have the wrong man.
1581713 1582839 Stand aside, will you, please?
1582881 1584473 I didn't kill anyone.

1584516 1587610 Right now what you are
is a suspect. Turn yourself in.

1588553 1590111 I'll listen to whatever
you have to say.

1590155 1592055 You're not gonna believe
what I have to say.
1594859 1596417 There's someone after me.

1596461 1599589 There's this group of men.
They want me dead.

1599631 1602259 And I don't even know if...
They're not even...

1603034 1605264 Yeah, who's gonna
listen to a madman?
1605303 1607100 Stand aside, Mrs. Murdoch.
1612110 1614840 No one ever listens to me.
1620385 1621511 Murdoch, stop!
1664162 1665151 How much further?
1665196 1666720 We're almost there, buddy.

1669434 1672733 Hey, you happen to know
the way to Shell Beach?

1672771 1675672 You're kidding. Me and the missus
spent our honeymoon there.

1675707 1678437 All you gotta do is take
Main Street west to...
1681279 1682974 Or is it the cross...

1683014 1686643 You know, that's funny.
I can't seem to remember...

1686685 1688983 if it's Main Street west
or the cross-town.

1693658 1697185 I'm sorry, Inspector,
I cannot be of more assistance...

1697228 1699093 but I am running late
for an appointment.

1699130 1701325 Well, I appreciate
your taking the time.

1709641 1711939 There's just one thing
that puzzles me.

1711976 1716640 I've met quite a few murderers
in the course of my work.
1716681 1719343 Murdoch doesn't strike me as one.

1719384 1723047 Perhaps you are not
accustomed to digging deep enough.

1723088 1725613 Well, I do know when someone
is lying to me, Doctor.

1725657 1728285 Forgive me, Inspector,
but you are not a clinician.

1728326 1732057 Judging personalities
happens to be my business.

1732097 1734122 Well, maybe you could
give me a few pointers.
1736034 1738059 Let's take you, for instance.
1738103 1741470 You are a fastidious man, driven.
1741506 1743565 Consumed by details.
1744342 1746242 I would say your life is...
1747545 1748534 rather lonely.

1749347 1751907 Good evening, Inspector.
I really must be going.

1793291 1797625 Closing time.
The pool is now closed.

1807172 1811802 Most unfortunate it is that we were
forced to seek you out here.

1812744 1815406 You know how uncomfortable
we find all this...

1817816 1820979 - I'm sorry. I...
- Failed to report in, yes.

1821019 1823647 I was frightened.
I have a weak heart, you know.

1823688 1827556 Your weakness is not, we think,
an affair of the heart.

1827592 1830254 We found this
in his hotel room.

1830295 1834231 Must we reproduce
Mr. Murdoch's memories again?
1834265 1835323 I tried to imprint him...

1835366 1837493 but he woke up, he knocked the syringe
right out of my hand.
1837535 1839628 I tried to stop him but he was too fast.
1839671 1840831 He has no memories, then?

1840872 1844239 Only fragments.
The procedure, it was interrupted.

1844275 1848075 I guess it's only a matter
of rounding him up.

1848112 1849670 You have had strays
before, right?

1849714 1853343 This is no stray, Doctor.
This one can tune.

1853785 1856583 But that's impossible.
I thought only you had that ability.

1856621 1860921 You will process another template
of the subject's memories, yes?
1860959 1862688 Of course. I'll imprint him again.

1862727 1867221 No. We require them
for a quite different purpose.

1868066 1870534 It's almost midnight,
Dr. Schreber.

1870568 1873002 We'll talk again
after tonight's tuning, but...
1873571 1875368 no more delays, yes?

1875406 1880207 No more inconsistencies
in your behavior.
1887719 1890586 You appear quite frail, Doctor.

1891356 1894848 Perhaps some exercise
would do you good.

1914746 1916407 - How is he?
- The same.
1917782 1920376 Walenski? It's me, Frank.
1926724 1928214 Come in, Frank.
1931095 1932995 Close the door.

1940438 1943805 I've been looking through
some of your old reports.
1943841 1945866 It's an interesting case.

1947045 1951880 The kind that can make
a man's career...
1953151 1955483 Yeah, I was on that case.

1955520 1959786 And then what?
What happened then, Eddie?
1959824 1961655 Nothing happened, Frank.

1961693 1965823 I've just been spending time
on the subway, riding in circles.
1965863 1967763 Thinking in circles.
1968666 1969758 There's no way out.

1971569 1973434 I've been over every inch
of this city.

1978176 1980542 You're scaring your wife
to death, Eddie.
1980578 1982273 She's not my wife.

1983781 1986750 I don't know who she is.
I don't know who any of us are.
1986784 1988718 What makes you say that?

1988753 1990812 Do you think about
the past much, Frank?
1992290 1993757 As much as the next guy.

1994359 1997487 See, I've been trying
to remember things...

1997528 2000224 clearly remember things
from my past.

2000264 2005702 But the more I try to think back,
the more it all starts to unravel.
2005737 2007068 None of it seems real.

2007105 2010472 It's like I've just been
dreaming this life...

2010508 2014069 and when I finally wake up
I'll be somebody else.
2014112 2015943 Somebody totally different.

2020685 2023381 You saw something,
didn't you, Eddie?
2023421 2026413 Something to do with the case.

2027025 2030483 There is no case.
There never was!

2030528 2034965 It's all just a big joke!
It's a joke!
2075440 2078204 Tonight's requirements are...

2078242 2083009 12 family photo albums,
9 personal diaries...

2083047 2087984 17 love letters,
assorted childhood photographs...

2088019 2092115 26 wallets,
ID's and social security cards.
2092156 2094249 These do bring back memories.
2096627 2098857 This one is still warm.
2100731 2103928 The recollections of a great lover?
2103968 2106994 A catalog of conquests?
2107038 2108528 We will soon find out.

2109907 2114537 You wouldn't appreciate that,
would you, Mr. Whatever your name is?

2114579 2118948 Not the sort of conquests
you would ever understand.
2122253 2124949 A touch of unhappy childhood.
2130795 2133491 A dash of teenage rebellion.
2135266 2138064 And last, but not least...
2138102 2140366 a tragic death in the family.
2152116 2153845 Why does Murdoch not sleep...
2153885 2155785 during the tuning as the others do?

2155820 2159950 I don't know. Maybe he's a step up
the evolutionary ladder.

2159991 2162858 A freak of nature.
He's adapting to survive.

2162894 2166295 What do you expect?
Weren't you looking for the human soul?

2166330 2168890 That's the purpose
of your little zoo, isn't it?

2168933 2172266 That's why you keep changing people
and things around every night.

2172303 2175397 Maybe you have finally found
what you are looking for...

2175439 2176633 and it's going
to bite you on your...

2180611 2184240 It requires several of your lifetimes
to master our gifts.

2184282 2188150 The idea that a simple man
could develop the ability to tune...
2188186 2189710 Is absurd, I know...

2189754 2191813 but what other
explanation is there?
2243774 2245139 Shut it down.
2260791 2262156 Get your paper right here!
2273671 2275400 It's driving me crazy.
2276907 2278704 And they call my job "unskilled".
2278743 2280040 You think you've got it tough?

2280077 2281942 You try looking after these kids,
for a change.

2282847 2286977 Anyways, Frederickson says
he'll take me off the damn night shift soon.
2287518 2289418 Well, it's about time, dear.
2390621 2392680 Can anybody hear me?!
2395760 2399218 Let the tuning commence.

2558822 2561848 The Goodwins.
Jeremy, Sylvia...
2561892 2564190 Jane and little Matthew.
2567998 2570057 Jane and little Matthew.
2600197 2602859 The rich get richer.

2602900 2606563 Probably have maid's quarters
before the night is through.
2659757 2661554 Dr. Schreber, I presume.

2664561 2666756 That's no way to greet
a patient, Doctor.

2666797 2668560 If that's what you are,
huh, Doctor?
2668599 2669998 Mr. Murdoch, please, I...

2670034 2671899 What is happening here?
Why is everyone asleep?
2671935 2674301 Shh. Please keep your voice down.

2674338 2676272 Why can't I remember anything?
What have you done to me?

2676306 2679070 Nothing, nothing.
Please, I want to help you.
2679109 2680406 We can't talk here.

2680444 2682639 It is not safe.
If they see us together, they'll...

2682680 2684113 I don't care.
I want some answers.
2684148 2685479 I want some answers now!
2685516 2686676 Who are they?
2686717 2688651 Why are they trying to kill me?
2695092 2698255 My God. You really can do it.

2699630 2701860 Listen to me, John.
You have their power.

2701899 2703992 You can make things happen
by will alone.

2704034 2707333 They call it tuning. That is how they make
the buildings change.

2707371 2709931 Just now you acted out
of self-defense. A reflex.

2709973 2712806 But I can teach you to control
your power consciously.

2712843 2715175 Let me help you, John.
Together we can stop them.
2715212 2716839 We can take the city back.
2723320 2725254 My glasses, please.

2772369 2775031 He made a terrible
impression for the firm...
2775072 2777404 lollygagging around as he did.

2777441 2780342 So I simply told Frederickson
I was going to have to let him go.
2780377 2783073 And well you should have, darling.
2783413 2784778 He attacked me.
2785749 2786977 I don't know where he has gone.
2788085 2789950 Come, Dr. Schreber.
2790988 2792580 We have much to do.

2811108 2818708 # They say that you're
a run-around lover #
2818749 2822651 # Though you say #

2829760 2835528 # But if you put me down
for another #
2840137 2844574 # Believe me, I'll know #
2846276 2850144 # 'Cause the night #
2850180 2854116 # Has a thousand eyes #
2855018 2858954 # And a thousand eyes #
2858989 2862254 # Can't tell, but see #
2864628 2871192 # If you are true to me #
2877007 2882707 # When you tell those little white lies #

2882746 2893179 # That the night
has a thousand eyes #
2896293 2900627 # A thousand eyes #

2907304 2910831 Tonight's experiment shall be conducted
in the following locations.

2910874 2915277 The first subject
shall be imprinted here on Avenue M.
2915312 2917837 Mr. Book. There is a problem.

2917881 2921214 There is no Avenue M.
We were unable to complete it.

2921251 2924982 During the last tuning
we detected a lack of control.

2925022 2927684 An opposing influence
on the machines?

2927724 2932457 Then this man Murdoch
is more powerful than we thought.
2932496 2934259 He's becoming like us.
2934298 2938860 So we must become like him.

2938902 2941336 The good doctor
has done as we asked?

2941371 2944636 The life and times
of John Murdoch, Volume 2.
2947010 2949342 We must not do this.

2949379 2952906 Murdoch does not possess
these memories, yes?

2952950 2955612 How will his imprint
allow us to find him?
2955652 2957984 Everywhere he goes...

2958021 2960649 everyone he seeks out
will be known to us.

2960691 2965685 And as he follows the clues,
so shall we follow the memories.

2965729 2968391 Perhaps we have forgotten
what happened last time, when we t...
2968432 2971560 Yes. Poor, poor Mr...
2971601 2973466 We have not forgotten.

2973503 2980773 If Mr. Hand wishes to make this sacrifice
for the greater good...

2982879 2988078 But to imprint one of us.
Failure has always resulted.

2988118 2991645 What Mr. Hand proposes
is our only option.
2998795 3000558 This may sting a bit.
3043507 3047034 I have John Murdoch... in mind.

3053750 3057208 "I found this postcard
among your mother's things.

3057254 3059381 "Brings back memories,
doesn't it?
3059423 3061288 "Stop by sometime.

3061324 3063121 "We'll see if we
can't hook ourselves...
3063160 3064491 "another mermaid.
3064528 3066496 "Love to Emma. Karl."
3075205 3076934 Karl Harris.

3094624 3097491 Excuse me. Can you tell
me the way to Avenue C?
3097527 3098721 Try the subway.
3102732 3104290 You got a problem, pal?
3104334 3107269 You been working here long?

3108338 3111637 25 years. No days off
for good behavior.
3136766 3139929 We're looking for John Murdoch.
3173904 3175997 She knows nothing, Mr. Hand.
3176039 3178166 A dead end, yes, Mr. Wall.

3178208 3180802 We thought his imprint would
allow us to track him, yes...

3180844 3183278 but instead we have
been brought here.
3183313 3184940 This is irrational.
3184981 3187313 Instincts are irrational, Mr. Wall...

3187350 3190786 and we must follow
where they lead, yes.

3190820 3195314 Mr. Sleep suggests he may go

3195358 3197417 He does not care about our job.
3197460 3200293 Indulge us, Mr. Hand.
3200330 3201957 If you were Murdoch...
3205001 3206559 I were Murdoch...
3208205 3210105 I would remember...

3210140 3213701 how my wife had hurt me

3218481 3221973 I would look for a way

3225655 3228021 Leave me alone with her.
3228058 3229821 There's work to be done.
3233330 3235628 All change, platform 3.
3235665 3238498 Platform 3, all change.
3238535 3240230 All change? Excuse me.
3240270 3241601 How do I get to the end of the line?
3241638 3243196 You want the Express.
3250947 3254212 No trains leave on platform 7.

3258221 3259711 That's the Express.
3261057 3262991 There's no way out, you know?

3263026 3265927 You can't get out of the city.

3266997 3268658 You're Murdoch, aren't you?
3269132 3270895 The one they've been looking for.

3270934 3272765 - Who are you?
- Used to be a cop.
3273470 3275938 At least, in this life, I was.

3276339 3278432 They steal people's

3278975 3280806 Then they swap them around

3280844 3283540 I've seen them do it.

3283580 3285673 till no one knows

3285715 3286977 How do you know all this?

3287017 3291351 Once in a while, one of us wakes up

3291388 3293618 It's not supposed to happen,

3293657 3295682 It happened to me.
3295725 3297625 They'll come looking for you, Murdoch.
3298762 3300389 Just like they'll come looking for me.
3302565 3304032 I figured a way out.
3315445 3316776 They were here.
3319983 3322281 This was to be his home.
3325021 3326886 That was when we loved her.
3326923 3328788 This is all well and good, Mr. Hand...

3328825 3333319 But we require a more practical link

3338501 3340833 And I know where to find her.

3348678 3351613 We're very lucky,

3352682 3356948 To be able to revisit those places

3357754 3359847 I thought it was more

3363493 3365620 But imagine a life...
3365662 3368290 alien to yours...

3368331 3370026 in which your memories

3370066 3373627 but those shared

3374371 3378671 Imagine the torment

3378708 3381176 no experiences to call your own.
3383813 3386043 If it was all you knew...
3386082 3387811 maybe it would be a comfort.

3388485 3391181 But if you were to discover

3392422 3394788 Something... better.

3398895 3401523 There used to be a ferry

3401564 3403327 Biggest thing you ever saw.
3403366 3406494 Lit up like a floating birthday cake.

3407737 3410001 That's just what my husband

3410039 3411870 on this very spot.
3413209 3415074 Where is your husband now?

3415111 3418603 I wish I knew.

3419416 3422317 I met my wife at this place.
3422352 3424149 It's where I first met my husband.
3424187 3426417 Small world.
3528858 3530189 What are you doing here?
3530226 3532126 I've been following you.
3535999 3537830 Hold it right there!
3543540 3544802 It's been so damn long...

3544841 3547674 I thought you'd forgotten

3548444 3550241 You son of a gun!
3573369 3575394 Shell Beach is where I grew up?
3575438 3576598 That's what I said.
3576639 3579005 Shell Beach, your hometown.

3587050 3589075 You gotta have some idea.
3590687 3591915 Sorry, Johnny.

3593389 3596290 The old cracker barrel

3599862 3601489 So bright there.
3601531 3603795 Brighter times, I guess.

3605501 3607901 You were always scribbling

3608438 3611066 That's me and your pa.
3611107 3613268 What a couple of handsome fools.

3620550 3621744 Where are they now?
3622719 3624710 They're dead, Johnny.

3624754 3627188 They died when their house

3627223 3628884 I looked after you.
3629859 3631793 You don't remember that, really?

3660690 3662658 Why are you here, Mrs. Murdoch?

3671801 3674269 My husband told me

3678107 3680371 He told me he wanted

3695158 3698958 I wanted to talk to her. I thought maybe

3700163 3702597 Stay here.

3713943 3719074 Yeah, this is Bumstead. Send the

3719449 3722179 There's been another one.

3722218 3725415 It's the same pattern.

3737467 3739662 It's OK. I won't hurt you.
3751714 3753682 Where the hell did she come from?
3753716 3755206 I found her hiding.
3755952 3757783 She saw what happened here.

3784881 3787907 Are you ready to go home,

3787950 3790612 The inspector is gonna take me. Thanks.
3815511 3816773 It's beautiful.
3819348 3822647 It was a gift from my mother.
3822685 3825210 She died recently.

3825254 3827552 I keep it with me

3834297 3836458 It's a funny thing, though.

3836499 3838865 I can't remember

3841437 3844429 How do you think I could

3846609 3850773 Do you think about the past much,

3861991 3864516 I left your old room like it was.
3864594 3866687 You can sleep here tonight, huh?
3866762 3869060 Glad to have you back, Johnny...
3869098 3870793 even if it is for just a night.
3872969 3874197 Is that the right time?

3874237 3878139 Why, sure. That clock's

3881110 3882577 What do you think, Johnny?

3882612 3884603 I don't understand.

3884647 3886342 What happened to the day?

3886382 3889249 You're tired. Anything's possible.

3890720 3894281 get some sleep. We'll straighten

3920149 3923050 "Guide to Shell Beach

3948878 3951005 He's acting mighty peculiar.
3951047 3953106 I know. He's not himself.

3953149 3955083 Keep him there,

3961123 3962988 I can't promise anything,

3963025 3964583 We just have to play it as it comes.
3964627 3968119 Johnny, we just wanted to help.

3978374 3982071 Johnny, if you're in some kind of trouble...

3983546 3986014 Haven't seen you in so long.

4060589 4065993 Mr. Murdoch... you've been

4072501 4073866 There's no escape.
4073903 4075894 The city's ours. We made it.
4075938 4077428 What are you talking about?

4077473 4080670 We fashioned this city

4080709 4084543 different eras, different pasts

4084580 4087071 Each night, we revise it, refine it...
4087116 4088606 in order to learn.
4090086 4091553 About you, Mr. Murdoch...
4091587 4093851 you and your fellow inhabitants...
4093889 4095686 what makes you human.

4096225 4099251 - Why?!

4100229 4102595 I understand you now, Mr. Murdoch.

4108938 4111566 running along the waves as a child...

4111607 4116544 meeting Emma at the river...

4117146 4118306 What are you?
4118347 4120110 You've seen what we are.
4120149 4123084 We use your dead as vessels.
4269265 4271756 What about her? Ring any bells?
4271800 4273131 She was alive when I left her.
4273168 4274260 What about this?
4274303 4276328 This is nothing. This is...

4276372 4278670 It must mean something,

4278707 4279867 What pictures?
4280876 4281900 I don't understand this.

4281944 4284777 Stop playing games with me, Murdoch!

4284813 4286303 I am not telling you lies!

4286348 4288748 Help me out here.

4288784 4290877 I have this jigsaw puzzle

4290919 4293911 and every time I try to rearrange

4293956 4295321 You think it makes sense to me?

4295357 4297416 I'm as much in the dark here

4297459 4299620 You let me ask you a question?

4300729 4302128 You heard of a place

4302164 4304655 - Sure.

4304700 4306133 - Yeah.

4306168 4310298 All right. You just...

4311206 4312264 Where? Where do you go?
4312308 4314401 Just give me a second, will ya?
4316578 4318239 You can't remember, can you?
4320549 4321982 You think that's kind of odd?
4325054 4326453 I got a better one for you.
4326488 4327785 When was the last time...

4327823 4330690 you remember doing

4330726 4331818 What do you mean?
4331860 4334124 I just mean... during the day.

4336231 4337789 When was the last time
you remember seeing it?

4337833 4341599 And I'm not talking about some distant,

4341637 4344765 I mean like yesterday?

4344807 4347207 Can you come up

4348744 4350006 You can't, can you?

4350045 4353310 You know something?

4353349 4356045 exists... in this place.

4356085 4360317 'Cause I've been up for hours and hours

4361123 4363751 - That is crazy.

4363792 4366158 Listen to me, Bumstead.

4368263 4369821 They're doing something to all of us.

4369865 4372629 - Shut up, I've heard enough.

4372668 4374397 - Shut up, will ya! Shut up!

4384646 4387911 There has to be an explanation

4396058 4397389 Explain this.
4418013 4420208 John, I'm so sorry.
4421183 4423014 I never meant to hurt you, John...

4423051 4424177 and I did it,

4424219 4426380 I wish I could take it all back.
4426422 4428947 No. Emma... You didn't do it.

4428991 4431755 This... affair of yours,

4431794 4433421 the thing you're

4433462 4435327 you didn't do it.

4435364 4436763 What do you mean?
4436799 4439165 I know this is gonna sound crazy...

4439201 4442102 but what if we never

4442137 4444571 What if the first time we ever met...

4444606 4448440 was last night in your...
in our apartment...
4448477 4451412 and everything you remember...

4451447 4454280 and everything that I'm supposed

4454316 4456910 Someone just wants us to think it did.
4462090 4464456 You know, back in the apartment...

4465260 4467694 I suddenly felt like

4469498 4471989 It was as if you were a stranger.
4474269 4475998 But how can that be true?
4476605 4480735 I so vividly remember meeting you.
4480776 4483802 I remember falling in love with you.
4484646 4486443 I remember losing you.
4492888 4493980 just one more minute.
4500496 4502623 I love you, John.
4505467 4508163 You can't fake something like that.

4546575 4550341 I... kind of thought

4552981 4555643 Oh, and...

4564059 4566050 I knew you'd track the killer down, sir.
4595991 4597151 How can we help you, sir?
4597192 4599558 You can sleep.

4621984 4625579 I wanted to be the first

4628290 4631088 Take us to Murdoch.
4662391 4664154 I knew you'd come eventually.

4664192 4666888 Don't you think it's about time

4666928 4669123 Yes. Yes, of course.
4669164 4670893 Won't you please sit down?
4674002 4676027 I come here quite often.

4676071 4678539 It's one of the few places

4678573 4681940 You see,

4683111 4685045 One could almost call it a phobia.

4685614 4688879 Who are they?

4690519 4692578 Well, for now, let's just say...

4692621 4695317 that you were the subject

4699027 4700961 You're not crazy, John.
4701730 4703459 And you are not a murderer.
4705400 4707163 I'm sorry about this. I truly am.
4707202 4708726 But we do not have much time...

4708770 4711398 and I cannot afford the luxury

4711440 4712964 Everything you need to know...

4713008 4715340 all the answers

4715377 4716571 I need you to inject yourself.

4716611 4719011 It's the only way to

4719047 4720344 You're kidding me, right?

4720382 4723351 We're running out of time, John.

4723952 4725419 Give me the gun, Doctor.

4730692 4733661 but you're the one

4734563 4736360 You do not know

4737566 4741161 What, exactly is in this... Doctor?

4742904 4745099 All the answers you've

4745140 4746232 I swear to you.

4747776 4752839 Guess I'll just have to

4752881 4754075 If you don't mind.
4754116 4755481 Let's go, Doctor.

4756818 4762188 - Go? Where are we going?

4763225 4765591 That's where you want to go, isn't it?
4776271 4777761 Why are you doing this?
4779474 4781101 What do you hope to gain by helping me?

4783478 4786447 None of these maps extend far enough

4786481 4787880 You won't find anything there...

4787916 4789850 I promise you!

4789885 4792410 If you've been there,

4793555 4795113 We'll see for ourselves.

4798393 4801123 I refuse.

4813375 4815536 You were saying, doctor?

4827289 4830816 I don't understand.

4837566 4839158 Try that again,

4839201 4840532 fishing you out of the canal.

4840569 4841968 Just don't hurt me.

4842003 4844028 It doesn't matter anymore anyway.
4854883 4857181 Who are you people?

4861356 4865850 We will give you some more

4869397 4871297 You will be soon, yes.
4875370 4878237 I have another use for her first.

4884980 4890179 First there was darkness.
Then came the strangers.

4892354 4894652 They abducted us
and brought us here.
4895924 4898688 This city, everyone in it...
4898727 4900092 is their experiment.

4900128 4903029 They mix and match
our memories as they see fit...

4903064 4905828 trying to divine
what makes us unique.

4906534 4909298 One day, a man
might be an inspector.
4909337 4912238 The next, someone entirely different.

4912274 4915573 When they want to
study a murderer for instance...

4915610 4919444 they simply imprint one of their citizens
with a new personality...

4920548 4924575 arrange a family for him,
friends, an entire history...
4925387 4926411 even a lost wallet.
4927022 4928683 Then they observe the results.

4930125 4934221 Will a man, given the history
of a killer, continue in that vein?

4934262 4938255 Or are we, in fact, more
than the mere sum of our memories?

4938300 4943294 This business of you being a killer
was an unhappy coincidence.

4943338 4946205 You have had dozens
of lives before now.

4946241 4949574 You just happened to wake up
while I was imprinting you with this one.
4950345 4952472 Why are they doing all of this?
4952514 4955915 It is our capacity for individuality...

4955951 4958511 our souls that makes
us different from them.

4958553 4960919 They think they
can find the human soul...

4960956 4964084 if they understand
how our memories work.

4964125 4965387 All they have
are collective memories.
4965427 4968260 They share one group mind.
4968296 4969763 They're dying, you see?

4969798 4973234 Their entire race
is on the brink of extinction.
4973268 4975133 They think we can save them.

4975170 4977604 - Where do I fit in?
- You are different, John.

4978239 4981072 You resisted my attempt
to imprint you.

4985714 4989115 Somehow you have developed
their ability to tune.
4989150 4990447 That is how they change things.
4990485 4992009 That is how they built this city.

4992053 4994954 They have machines buried deep
beneath the surface...

4994990 4998926 that allow them
to focus their telepathic energies.

4999794 5002285 They control everything here,
even the sun.

5002330 5005663 That's why it's always dark.
They can't stand the light.
5005700 5006962 So why do they need you?

5007002 5011405 When they first brought us here,
they extracted what was in us.

5011439 5015273 So they could store the information,
remix it like so much paint...

5015310 5017835 and give us back new memories
of their choosing.

5017879 5021508 But they still needed an artist
to help them.

5023351 5026514 I understood the intricacies
of the human mind...
5026554 5029079 better than they ever could...

5029124 5031854 so they allowed me
to keep my skills as a scientist...
5031893 5033326 because they needed them.

5033361 5035829 But they made me
delete everything else.

5044205 5047038 Can you imagine what
it is like being forced...
5047075 5048804 to erase your own past?

5048843 5052176 What about my past?
What about my childhood?
5053081 5055777 Shell Beach, Uncle Karl.
5056551 5057848 What about this?
5058753 5060653 This was blank when I found it!
5060688 5062713 You still don't understand, John.

5062757 5065954 You were never a boy...
not in this place.

5065994 5068792 Your entire history is an illusion,
a fabrication...
5068830 5070695 as it is with all of us.

5070732 5073223 You made those drawings

5073268 5075133 You say they brought us here.
5084079 5085842 I don't remember.
5085880 5087609 None of us remember that...
5088316 5089908 what we once were...
5089951 5092385 what we might have been...
5092420 5093785 somewhere else.
5111272 5113240 I've taken you this far.
5113274 5115401 You don't need me anymore.
5161356 5164154 There is no ocean, John.
5164192 5168322 There is nothing beyond the city.
5168363 5171696 The only place home exists...
5173535 5175526 is in your head.
5222584 5224745 And now you know the truth.

5293388 5296289 You'll allow yourself
to surrender, Mr. Murdoch...

5296324 5298554 or it will result in
this one's death, yes?

5298593 5301118 What do I care?
She's not my real wife!
5301162 5302288 She's nothing to me!

5302330 5306562 But you do still care,
don't you, Mr. Murdoch?

5306601 5309263 You see, I have
become the monster...
5309304 5311295 you were intended to be.

5313107 5317009 Shall I end her life now

5320048 5322278 Don't hurt her, please!
5322317 5326947 Then surrender, Mr. Murdoch.

5374235 5377068 The doctor was right.

5379006 5380667 Kill him!
Kill him!
5384779 5387509 Kill him! Kill him!
5390184 5392709 He is powerful, yes.

5392754 5397214 Dangerous. But he can also
lead us to what we seek.
5397258 5400659 What the doctor calls the soul.

5400695 5404392 It is time for our experiment
to move into a final phase.

5404432 5407162 We no longer need
the other subjects.
5407201 5410830 The time for study is over.

5410872 5415070 It is time to be one
with John Murdoch.
5421749 5423580 It is time, Doctor.
5427955 5430719 Shut it down!
5430758 5433921 Shut it down forever!
5447809 5450073 What are you doing?

5450111 5454639 They want to imprint you
with their own collective memories.

5455983 5460113 They want to make you one of them,
so they can share your soul.

5466260 5468592 Imprint, Doctor.
No more disobedience.
5470498 5473490 The pain will only last a moment.
5485012 5486309 Remember, John.

5487582 5489550 You'll rise to greater
heights than that, my boy.

5489584 5491347 One day when you're older,
you'll understand.

5495556 5498423 That's it, John.
Practice makes perfect.

5498459 5501656 Now remember what I told you.
Never talk to strangers.
5501696 5503493 John, remember.

5503531 5506398 You're probably wondering why I keep
appearing in your memories.

5506434 5508959 It is because I have
inserted myself in them.

5509003 5511096 All of these memories
have been fabricated...
5511138 5512833 to teach you about the strangers.

5512874 5516002 Give you a lifetime of knowledge
in a single syringe.
5518846 5521212 You will survive, John.

5521249 5523547 You will find strength
within yourself...
5523584 5525552 and you will prevail.
5527722 5528711 Hi, Uncle Karl.
5532760 5534853 You're getting the hang of it, John.

5534896 5536955 Maybe one day
I'll be working for you.

5537765 5540996 This is the machine the strangers use
to amplify their thoughts.

5541035 5542900 The machine
that changes their world.
5542937 5544495 You must take control of it.
5544539 5546166 You must make the machine yours.
5546207 5548334 I know you can beat them, John.
5548376 5550867 But you must concentrate.
5553080 5554172 Something's wrong.
5562823 5565553 There is no time for romance, John.
5565593 5567925 The world can be what you make it.
5567962 5569987 What have you done?

5570031 5572556 You have the power
to make anything happen...
5572600 5574090 but you must act now!
5858986 5860453 I knew you could do it, John.
5860487 5862512 You have their power now.
5862556 5864421 You control their machines.
5866594 5869427 She is not Emma anymore, John.
5869463 5870862 She has been reimprinted.
5870898 5872593 So give her back her memories.

5872633 5875067 I can't. The facility

5875102 5878094 stored the memories
has been destroyed.
5880341 5883037 What are you going to do now, John?

5884745 5888579 You told me I had
the power, didn't you?

5888983 5891474 I can make these machines
do anything I want.

5893120 5895452 Make this world anything
I want it to be.

5896490 5899516 Just so long as I concentrate
hard enough.
5984378 5985777 Where are you going?
5988716 5990183 Shell Beach.

6031058 6032457 - What's the fare?
- Quarter.
6089349 6091476 Been waiting for you, yes?
6092219 6093379 What are you doing?

6093420 6096787 I'm just making a few little changes

6096824 6098519 Are we sure that's what we want?
6099026 6101460 I'm prepared to take my chances.

6103097 6105998 Your imprint is not
agreeable with my kind.

6107501 6109765 But I wanted to know
what it was like...
6111138 6112605 how you feel.

6112639 6115335 You know how I was

6115375 6119175 That person isn't me.

6119213 6122944 You wanted to know what it was

6124318 6127651 Well, you're not going

6129423 6132017 You went looking

6230424 6232324 It's so beautiful here.

6245038 6247871 Do you know if Shell Beach
is around here?
6247908 6250536 I think that's it just over there.
6268695 6270754 I'm headed that way myself.
6272699 6274724 Would you like to join me?
6283610 6285942 I'm Anna, by the way.

6285979 6288243 - What's your name?
- John.
6290651 6292118 John Murdoch.

6599359 6603489 # Like a flower

6605865 6608834 # Sway with ease #

6608868 6613168 # When we dance
you have a way with me #
6618144 6622911 # Other dancers may be on the floor #
6622949 6627648 # Dear, but my eyes will see only you #

6627687 6632386 # Only you have that
magic technique #
6632425 6637055 # When we sway I go weak #
6637097 6641056 # I can hear the sound of violins #
6641101 6646368 # Long before it begins #

6646406 6650536 # Make me thrill
as only you know how #
6650577 6656743 # Sway me smooth, sway me now #
6664591 6667958 # Sway me smooth #
